meanings.definition: A burial ground for the dead.
meanings.sent1: Many people visit cemeteries to pay respects to their loved ones.
meanings.sent2: The old cemetery in town is filled with history and stories.
meanings.sent3: The cemetery was so quiet, even the ghosts were whispering.
meanings.sent4: In the cemetery of memories, each gravestone tells a different tale.
meanings.sent5: The cemeteries at night have an eerie beauty under the moonlight.

meanings.sent1: The cemeteries in the countryside are peaceful and serene.
meanings.sent2: Visiting cemeteries can evoke feelings of both sadness and peace.
meanings.sent3: The cemetery seemed to be the only place where time stood still.
meanings.sent4: The rows of tombstones in the cemetery stretched as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent5: The cemeteries hold the stories of those who came before us.
